epsylon.environment

Class StaticEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • epsylon.environment.GenericEnvironment<Type>
      • epsylon.environment.StaticEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Environment<Type>

    public class StaticEnvironment
extends GenericEnvironment<Type>
    Represents a Static Environment of variables associated with their type.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alessio Moiso

    • Method Detail

      • checkAndPut

        public void checkAndPut(Ident id,
                        Type type)
        If not already present, puts an Identifier with its type into the Environment.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier.
        type - The associated type.
        Throws:
        TypecheckException - if the Identifier is already present in the Environment.

      • lookupAndCheck

        public Type lookupAndCheck(Ident id)
        Gets the Type associated to an Identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier
        Returns:
        The associated type.
        Throws:
        TypecheckException - if the Identifier cannot be found in the Environment.
